languages.text: {n}Кассия недовольно качает головой.{/n} "Я ожидала серьезного разговора, а вы смеетесь мне в лицо? Надеюсь, на второй вопрос вы сможете ответить серьезно?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия недовольно качает головой.{/n} "Я ожидала серьезного разговора, а вы смеетесь мне в лицо? Надеюсь, на второй вопрос вы сможете ответить серьезно?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia shakes her head in disapproval.{/n} I was expecting a serious conversation, but you are laughing in my face? I do hope you will give a proper answer to my second question."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия недовольно качает головой.{/n} "Я ожидала серьезного разговора, а вы смеетесь мне в лицо? Надеюсь, на второй вопрос вы сможете ответить серьезно?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia shakes her head with disapproval.{/n} I was expecting a serious conversation, but you are laughing me in the face? I hope you will give a proper answer to the second question."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅不赞同地摇了摇头。{/n}“我本期待能进行一场严肃的谈话，但你却在嘲笑我，是吗？我确实希望你能好好地回答我第二个问题。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shakes her head in disapproval.{/n} I was expecting a serious conversation, but you are laughing in my face? I do hope you will give a proper answer to my second question."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅不赞同地摇了摇头。{/n}“我本期待能进行一场严肃的谈话，但你却在嘲笑我，是吗？我确实希望你能好好地回答我第二个问题。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Esperaba una conversación seria, pero bromea. Espero que la respuesta a mi segunda pregunta sea más adecuada».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shakes her head in disapproval.{/n} I was expecting a serious conversation, but you are laughing in my face? I do hope you will give a proper answer to my second question."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Esperaba una conversación seria, pero bromea. Espero que la respuesta a mi segunda pregunta sea más adecuada».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは不服そうに首を横に振った。{/n}「あたくしは真剣な会話を期待していたのに、あたくしの顔を見て笑うのですか？2番目の質問にはきちんと答えてほしいものです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shakes her head in disapproval.{/n} I was expecting a serious conversation, but you are laughing in my face? I do hope you will give a proper answer to my second question."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは不服そうに首を横に振った。{/n}「あたくしは真剣な会話を期待していたのに、あたくしの顔を見て笑うのですか？2番目の質問にはきちんと答えてほしいものです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia schüttelt missbilligend den Kopf.{/n} "Ich hatte ein ernsthaftes Gespräch erwartet, doch Ihr lacht mir ins Gesicht? Hoffentlich würdigt Ihr wenigstens meine zweite Frage einer angemessenen Antwort."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shakes her head in disapproval.{/n} I was expecting a serious conversation, but you are laughing in my face? I do hope you will give a proper answer to my second question."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia schüttelt missbilligend den Kopf.{/n} "Ich hatte ein ernsthaftes Gespräch erwartet, doch Ihr lacht mir ins Gesicht? Hoffentlich würdigt Ihr wenigstens meine zweite Frage einer angemessenen Antwort."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia secoue la tête d'un air désapprobateur.{/n} « J'espérais vraiment que nous pourrions avoir une conversation réfléchie, mais je vois que vous avez décidé de vous moquer de moi. Je vous prierai de répondre à ma seconde question avec un peu plus de sérieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shakes her head in disapproval.{/n} I was expecting a serious conversation, but you are laughing in my face? I do hope you will give a proper answer to my second question."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia secoue la tête d'un air désapprobateur.{/n} « J'espérais vraiment que nous pourrions avoir une conversation réfléchie, mais je vois que vous avez décidé de vous moquer de moi. Je vous prierai de répondre à ma seconde question avec un peu plus de sérieux. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, onaylamayan bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} Ben ciddi bir sohbet beklentisindeydim. Sense benim yüzüme gülüyorsun, öyle mi? İkinci soruma gerçek bir yanıt vermeni umuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shakes her head in disapproval.{/n} I was expecting a serious conversation, but you are laughing in my face? I do hope you will give a proper answer to my second question."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia onaylamayan bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} Ben ciddi bir sohbet beklentisindeydim ama sen benim yüzüme gülüyorsun, öyle mi? İkinci soruma gerçek bir yanıt vermeni umuyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
